description: Non-integer average divisor divides the number.
comments: The sequence contains perfect numbers (A000396) and others. Most of them have only small prime factors.The first three terms are in A007691 (multiply perfect numbers) but 950976 is not since Sigma_1/x is not an integer.sigma_0(n) is the number of divisors of n (A000005).sigma_1(n) is the sum of the divisors of n [same as sigma(n)] (A000203).
formula: Average divisor=a=Sigma_1(x)/Sigma_0(x) is not an integer but x/a is.
example: x=28, Sigma_0=6, Sigma_1=56, a=S1/S0=9.33 is not an integer but x/a=3 is; x=950976, a=2958592/84=3521.33 but x/a=27 is integral.
author: _Labos Elemer_
